disable: DC 26  Performance  (trained) to bring the spirit's music to a close or DC 28  Occultism  (expert) to banish the spirit
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Hazard 8" pfs="">[Frenetic Musician](/Hazards.aspx?ID=145)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 66</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A spirit musician rises out of an instrument and plays a frantic, bone-shaking melody.

---

**Stealth**
DC 28 (expert) to hear phantom notes

**Disable**
DC 26 [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) (trained) to bring the spirit's music to a close or DC 28 [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) (expert) to banish the spirit

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Musical Assault** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) **Trigger** A creature touches the instrument; **Effect** The musician's bone-shaking musical performance deals 4d10+22 sonic damage to creatures within 30 feet (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save).

---
**Reset**
1 hour
name: Frenetic Musician
